priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire PARTNER-DDS Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C163396

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire PARTNER-DDS Test Name Terminology

definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes test name.
name: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire PARTNER-DDS Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated that I can't get my partner to improve his/her attitude about diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Can't Get Partner Improve Attitude

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Diabetes and me: Mean item score.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Diabetes and Me: Mean

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Diabetes and me: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Diabetes and Me: Moderate

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Diabetes and me: Sum of 5 items (5, 8, 9, 16, 21).
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Diabetes and Me: Sum

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated that diabetes often interrupts our plans.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Diabetes Often Interrupts Plans

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying that I am failing to help my partner manage diabetes more successfully.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Failing to Help Partner Manage

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling guilty about not doing enough to help my partner with diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Guilty Not Doing Enough to Help
terms.submissionValue: DDS03-Guilty Not Doing Enough to Help
synonyms: DDS03-Guilty Not Doing Enough to Help

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that trying to help my partner with his/her diabetes is always a battle.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Help My Partner Always a Battle
terms.submissionValue: DDS03-Help My Partner Always a Battle
synonyms: DDS03-Help My Partner Always a Battle

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - How best to help: Mean item score.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - How Best to Help: Mean

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - How best to help: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - How Best to Help: Moderate

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - How best to help: Sum of 5 items (2, 6, 7, 11, 13).
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - How Best to Help: Sum

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling unclear about exactly how much I should be involved in managing my partner's diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - How Involved Managing Diabetes

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying that don't know how to best help my partner manage diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - How to Best Help Partner Manage
terms.submissionValue: DDS03-How to Best Help Partner Manage
synonyms: DDS03-How to Best Help Partner Manage

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Hypoglycemia: Mean item score.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Hypoglycemia: Mean

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Hypoglycemia: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Hypoglycemia: Moderate

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Hypoglycemia: Sum of 4 items (1, 17, 18, 19).
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Hypoglycemia: Sum

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying about leaving my partner alone because of the possible danger of low blood sugars.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Leaving Alone Low Blood Sugars

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying about my partner's low blood sugars when he/she is sleeping.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Low Blood Sugars When Sleeping

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated that the more I try to help my partner manage his/her diabetes, the worse things get between us.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - More I Try The Worse Things Get
terms.submissionValue: DDS03-More I Try The Worse Things Get
synonyms: DDS03-More I Try The Worse Things Get

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that I never get a break from worrying about my partner's diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Never Get a Break From Worrying
terms.submissionValue: DDS03-Never Get a Break From Worrying
synonyms: DDS03-Never Get a Break From Worrying

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that no one notices that diabetes is hard on me, not just on my partner.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - No One Notices Diabetes Hard On Me
terms.submissionValue: DDS03-No One Notices Diabetes Hard On Me
synonyms: DDS03-No One Notices Diabetes Hard On Me

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Concerned that my partner and I are not working well together when it comes to diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Not Working Well Together

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling overwhelmed by the constant demands of my partner's diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Overwhelmed by Constant Demands

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - My partner's diabetes management: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Diabetes Manage: Moderate

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - My partner's diabetes management: Mean item score.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Diabetes Management: Mean

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - My partner's diabetes management: Sum of 7 items (3, 4, 10, 12, 14, 15, 20).
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Diabetes Management: Sum

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that my partner doesn't try hard enough to manage his/her diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Doesn't Try Hard Enough

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying about my partner's driving because of possible low blood sugars.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Driving Low Blood Sugars

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated because my partner ignores my suggestions about diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Ignores My Suggestions

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Frustrated that my partner shuts me out of his/her diabetes.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Partner Shuts Me Out

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that I stay silent about my partner's diabetes more than I really should.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Silent About My Partner's Diabetes

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Feeling that diabetes is taking up too much of my mental and physical energy every day.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Taking Too Much of My Energy
terms.submissionValue: DDS03-Taking Too Much of My Energy
synonyms: DDS03-Taking Too Much of My Energy

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Total DDS score: Mean item score.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Total DDS Score: Mean

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Total DDS score: Moderate distress or greater? (mean score > 2).
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Total DDS Score: Moderate

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - Total DDS score: Sum of 21 item scores.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Total DDS Score: Sum

terms.definition: Diabetes Distress Scale for Partners of Adults with Type 1 Diabetes - During the past month, I have been: Worrying about my partner's low blood sugars.
terms.preferredTerm: PARTNER-DDS - Worry About Low Blood Sugars
